1: לְדָוִ֡ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> אֵ֘לֶ֤יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> אֶקְרָ֗א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Unto thee will I cry</n> צוּרִי֮ <sup>6697 </sup> <n>my rock</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֶּחֱרַ֪שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>to me lest [if] thou be silent</n> מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>do</n> תֶּֽחֱשֶׁ֥ה <sup>2790 </sup> <n>not be deaf</n> מִמֶּ֑נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <sup>4911 </sup> <n>to me I become</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>who</n> י֥וֹרְדֵי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>like them that go down</n> בֽוֹר׃ <sup>953 </sup> <n>into the pit</n>
2: שְׁמַ֤ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the voice</n> תַּ֭חֲנוּנַי <sup>8469 </sup> <n>of my supplications</n> בְּשַׁוְּעִ֣י <sup>7768 </sup> <n>when I cry</n> אֵלֶ֑יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>toward</n> בְּנָשְׂאִ֥י <sup>5375 </sup> <n>unto thee when I lift up</n> יָ֝דַ֗י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>my hands</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>toward</n> דְּבִ֥יר <sup>1687 </sup> <n>oracle</n> קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>toward thy holy</n>
3: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּמְשְׁכֵ֣נִי <sup>4900 </sup> <n>Draw me not away</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> רְשָׁעִים֮ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>with the wicked</n> וְעִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>who</n> פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <sup>6466 </sup> <n>and with the workers</n> אָ֥וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>of iniquity</n> דֹּבְרֵ֣י <sup>1696 </sup> <n>which speak</n> שָׁ֭לוֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> רֵֽעֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>7453 </sup> <n>to their neighbours</n> וְ֝רָעָ֗ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>but mischief</n> בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>[is] in their hearts</n>
4: תֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give</n> לָהֶ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>according</n> כְּפָעֳלָם֮ <sup>6467 </sup> <n>them according to their deeds</n> וּכְרֹ֪עַ <sup>7455 </sup> <n>and according to the wickedness</n> מַֽעַלְלֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <sup>4611 </sup> <n>of their endeavours</n> כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>them after the work</n> יְ֭דֵיהֶם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of their hands</n> תֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>give</n> לָהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> הָשֵׁ֖ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>render</n> גְּמוּלָ֣ם <sup>1576 </sup> <n>to them their desert</n> לָהֶֽם׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יָבִ֡ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>Because they regard</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> פְּעֻלֹּ֣ת <sup>6468 </sup> <n>not the works</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>nor the operation</n> יָדָ֑יו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of his hands</n> יֶ֝הֶרְסֵ֗ם <sup>2040 </sup> <n>he shall destroy</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִבְנֵֽם׃ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>them and not build them up</n>
6: בָּר֥וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[be] the LORD</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> שָׁ֝מַע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>because he hath heard</n> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the voice</n> תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <sup>8469 </sup> <n>of my supplications</n>
7: יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> עֻזִּ֥י <sup>5797 </sup> <n>[is] my strength</n> וּמָגִנִּי֮ <sup>4043 </sup> <n>and my shield</n> בּ֤וֹ בָטַ֥ח <sup>982 </sup> <n>trusted</n> לִבִּ֗י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>my heart</n> וְֽנֶ֫עֱזָ֥רְתִּי <sup>5826 </sup> <n>in him and I am helped</n> וַיַּעֲלֹ֥ז <sup>5937 </sup> <n>greatly rejoiceth</n> לִבִּ֑י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>therefore my heart</n> וּֽמִשִּׁירִ֥י <sup>7892 </sup> <n>and with my song</n> אֲהוֹדֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>will I praise</n>
8: יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> עֹֽז־ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>[is] their strength</n> לָ֑מוֹ וּמָ֘ע֤וֹז <sup>4581 </sup> <n>strength</n> יְשׁוּע֖וֹת <sup>3444 </sup> <n>and he [is] the saving</n> מְשִׁיח֣וֹ <sup>4899 </sup> <n>of his anointed</n> הֽוּא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
9: הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה ׀ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>Save</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמֶּ֗ךָ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>thy people</n> וּבָרֵ֥ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>and bless</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>thine inheritance</n> וּֽרְעֵ֥ם <sup>7462 </sup> <n>feed</n> וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם <sup>5375 </sup> <n>them also and lift them up</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>for</n> הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
